response.job_title: Lead Software Engineer | FullStack Developer | Electronic Engineer
response.summary:
FullStack Software Engineer with +3 years of experience and Electronic Engineer from the National University of Colombia. Experienced in team leadership and project development in Software Engineering, Finances, Web VR games, ​​Biomedical Engineering, IoT, and electronics in general. Bolero lover and guitarist from time to time.

FullStack Software Developer con +3 años de experiencia e Ingeniero Electrónico de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia. Tengo experiencia en el liderazgo y desarrollo de proyectos en el área de Ingeniería de Software,  Finanzas, Juegos Web en Realidad Virtual, Ingeniería Biomédica, IoT y electrónica en general. Amante de los boleros y guitarrista de vez en cuando.
response.skills: Web Content Optimization, Team Leadership, TypeScript, Microservices, Github Actions, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services (AWS), PostgreSQL, Express.js, Webrtc, Full-Stack Development, Electronics, React.js, Angular, NestJS, Next.js, Node.js, Three.js, Firebase

profile_positions.description:
Leading a dynamic team of five developers at everythingmoney.com, I oversee the creation and enhancement of a comprehensive investment platform.

Key responsibilities and achievements:

• Managed a smooth migration from Angular to React.
• Developed a real-time stock prices microservice, processing thousands of data points per second.
• Ensured endpoint optimization, with the majority achieving speeds below 500ms.
• Implemented Redis and Bull queue systems for efficient data recalculations and fetching.
• Led the team to meet project deadlines consistently, contributing to robust, high-performing software.
• Used technologies such as Nest Js, Postgresql, Redis, Angular, React, Zustand, AWS Services, Kubernetes, Docker, and Github Actions.

In this role, I am committed to delivering quality products and fostering a collaborative, learning-oriented team environment.
profile_positions.title: Lead Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Developed and mantained a +5000 users Finance application (everythingmoney.com) using Nest JS, React TS/Angular TS, Postgress/Redis, Realtime, Websockets, Cronjobs, CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub Actions, etc.

- Implemented a highly scalable realtime chat with channels, interactions, pictures, videos, link sharing, reactions, replies, etc.

- Set path and performed a progressive migration from Angular 13 to React on the web app.

- Enhanced and developed multiple batch fetching cronjobs, websocket realtime deployments, microservices and processing queues ensuring high efficiency and scalability patterns.

- Implemented agile methodologies to improve team work, development times and product quality.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Software Engineer

profile_positions.description: Working as a Full Stack Developer for remote US clients in multicultural teams (US, Mexico, Perú, Bolivia) using technologies like Nest JS/Node JS, React Typescript/Angular, Mongoose/Postgress, etc.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Software Engineer

profile_positions.description: Full Stack Game Developer at Verne Studios. Developed 4 VR web games with the team using Three.js, React and Firebase, also developed and integrated WebRTC realtime video/audio calls on VR Web environments.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Game Developer

profile_positions.description: Designed and developed SuperMixtos.com, a highly customized e-commerce  for a rice restaurant using technologies like Next JS, Strapi, and Mongo DB, AWS S3, etc.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Software Developer
